EmailTemplate.description: Email template to be sent to applicant after successful submission of a renewal registration
EmailTemplate.name: Application Successfully Submitted for Renewal
EmailTemplate.subject: {!License_Registration__c.Legal_Entity_Name__c} {!License_Registration__c.License_Registration_Type__c} Renewal {!License_Registration__c.Application_Type__c} Submission {!License_Registration__c.License_Registration_Number__c}
